description.value:
Serene goddess of the moon, she watches over her charge's slumber, warding them from the other things that dwell there, that both can live peacefully together.

Edicts help the terrifying find a place where it can live in peace, lend aid to the troubled of mind, protect those threatened by the terrors of the night in all its shapes

Anathema deny a broken mind or horrific beast a chance for peace, allow either to bring harm when it could have been avoided
